item.title: Romanian Producer Ada Solomon Has 3 Films in Locarno’s Competition and Likes Cinema to Cause Debate: “We Need Dialogue More Than Ever”
item.description: “For me, it’s very important for cinema to have something to say,” the woman behind ‘Dracula’ and much more tells THR. “The challenges are so complex because the one-sided perspectives are dominating.
